website_summaries.verdict: Parents will love this great deal that is less expensive than other comparative sets, and little girls will love the characters.
pros: This set is constructed of a decent fabric that doesn't bleed or warp after laundering, keeping the beautiful color and design
cons: The seams have a tendency to rip too easily, and there is no top sheet included in the set

customer_reviews.title: I want to say this was such an awesome price! I was having issues buying bedding online ...
customer_reviews.text: First, I want to say this was such an awesome price! I was having issues buying bedding online from another company, and it was totally different from what the picture looked like. BUT... this was exactly how it looked like in the picture and actually even better in person!! The actual comforter is nice and soft on the inside and the picture quality is awesome! I can't wait to finish up my daughter's Frozen room for her Birthday surprise, I know she will LOVE THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I ordered this for a full size bed and wish I could find it on queen because I wish it was slightly wider but still very happy. My daughter loves it!! Note: it does not come with a flat sheet (I overlooked that part.. easy fix but just FYI!). My set came with the comforter, fitted sheet and two pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: IheartAmazon!

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Why don't bed sets come with a top sheet anymore? This is nice, but the fitted sheet is pretty low quality. A bit stiff, non-breathable. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but my 4 year old doesn't care because ELSA.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loved this set, however, I feel like it was very cheaply made. The pillow case is already ripped down the seam with less than three weeks use. I can sew it back, but the point is this is a new product and should not happen. I probably wouldn't buy this particular set again, but then again, all the character themed sets are probably all the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Fitted sheet elastic broke after less than 6 months
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set BUT unfortunately the fitted sheet lasted less than 6 months before the elastic broke. In my opinion it is over priced for two pillow cases, a fitted sheet and a light comforter. Now we are left with no sheets and just a comforter and pillow cases. I wouldn’t recommend this product at this price point and I would caution those who choose to purchase it that it will not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Brian Wallace

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome Frozen Bed Set
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is wonderful. The colors are very vibrant, the pattern is beautiful, construction is great and it was just as pictured. Not only that, but the fitted sheet was so soft and the comforter is a decent weight. My daughter was over the moon about her new bed set. Better still, it washes great and still looks amazing. I would highly recommend this set for anyone looking for a beautiful, kid approved Frozen set.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Martin

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but pretty
customer_reviews.text: Color is vibrant, material soft and lightweight, but I put into wash 1st thing, and stitching is puckered across Elsa’s face and threads are breaking. I read reviews about this being cheaply made, but bought anyway because my granddaughter wanted pink. Beautiful, but won’t last long. She is happy though, so I am ok with purchase. I do wish it came with a top sheet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and soft!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for your money. My daughters love their comforter and it washes great!
customer_reviews.author: Mainers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 yr old daughter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 3 yr old daughter! She loves it becsuse it has Anna and Elsa on it. Nice colors to@
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set! More than I planned to spend BUT it's worth it! The comforter is a nice thick microfiber and feels really warm. My daughter was beyond thrilled to open it and get it on her bed! Really nice set. I would definitely buy from this seller and this brand in the future! I have not washed it yet so I am hoping after I do it comes out still looking just as nice! =)
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: and design pops right off the set it's so beautiful and I'm glad that the comforter was at medium ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the comforter set I became frozen. The color, and design pops right off the set it's so beautiful and I'm glad that the comforter was at medium weight. Thank you for making my other grand daughter happy.
customer_reviews.author: wiggieworm

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my daughter twin bed. The material is nice and soft it keeps her warm enough to where she don't need an extra blanket on the bed. The sheet fits an extra thick twin mattress . I thought the sheet would feel scratchy/rough but its not feels pretty good we do have to remember that its not 1500 thread count sheets but it works out good for my little girl. The color is exactly what you see rich hues.
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set is wonderful. You can't beat the price for a full fitted sheet, 2 pillowcases & comforter! The comforter is really softer than I expected and the colors are great too!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice bedding set that I got for my granddaughter's 7th ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bedding set that I got for my granddaughter's 7th birthday. She loves it. I gave 4 stars because it does not include a top sheet which would be nice. I had to try and find a solid sheet that would come close to matching one of the other colors in the printed bottom sheet. Overall, I was happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: BAC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bedding set
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Bedding set!This comfortables is very soft and color fuful great, Ich bin absolut überwältigt von diesm comforter set ,Wer es nicht kaufe ist selbst schuld ,Perfekt, Meisterwerk ,Beste comforter set, big wow.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Been using for over a year and they are my daughters favorite sheets
customer_reviews.author: Molleigh & Crus

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell !!
customer_reviews.text: The blanket and pillow case are great but the sheets are horrible. There was a whole in the sheets and its smell really bad. Once i washed the blanket and pillow case they where fine but next time i would not buy this brand again. Not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Diis

customer_reviews.title: It came!
customer_reviews.text: Received the bedding! My 4 year old is ecstatic! She is very very happy. Only one thing different Anna is wearing a cloak and in the picture she isn't. But its still an awesome bed set so far! I will be doing another review after 1 week of use. One other thing wrong was that it arrived 1 day late said between 11:15am and 3:15pm and came at 7:30pm. Glad it came!
customer_reviews.author: AntoniaF Reller

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters frozen room and she loved it even I love it it's very comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.author: Kassie.s.

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed in that alone
customer_reviews.text: They color I got was purple, not pink. very disappointed in that alone. We too have hot pink curtains like the pic shown, but I guarantee that the comforter did not match like shown. Oh, and the flat sheep was purple, too. It broke my heart when my child cried when I said I was returning it so I am keeping it, but need to warn others. IT IS NOT PINK AS SHOWN!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Phelps Branton

customer_reviews.title: Frozenmania
customer_reviews.text: A very wonderful item for the kids that love Frozen. Just keep in mind you get a fitted sheet but no top sheet. The Comforter can be used on a twin or full size bed so that is pretty awesome. Very high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Benway

customer_reviews.title: Light weight comfortable and soft material matched products description
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my daughters. I love the vibrant purple very light weight soft and comfortable material. What you see is exactly what you get with this item the description didnt fail me.

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is very nice, comforter is very soft to tohe toch and ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very nice, comforter is very soft to tohe toch and soesnt change if washed properly. .Only issue I had with it is that the sheets were missing. Amazon did make it up to me by a partial refund, but the hassle was inconvienent.

customer_reviews.title: very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves it! It's good quality for the price. He sheet is soft and the comforter is warm. Very happy with the purchase. Also very happy with the delivery. I ordered it on Friday and paid extra for Saturday delivery which is always risky. I got it by noon the next day!

customer_reviews.title: Put together well and most of all my granddaughter will absolutely love it!

product_meta.title: Disney Frozen Nordic Florals Comforter Set with Fitted Sheet, Full
product_meta.description: Size:Full| Color:PinkDisney Frozen Nordic Floral full bedding comforter set. Features Size: Full Machine washable (machine wash cold before use, tumble dry low, remove promptly, do not iron).
feature_bullets: Full comforter set includes 1 Comforter, 2 standard shams, 1 fitted sheet
Comforter 76-inch by 86-inch, pillowcases 20-inch by 30-inch, fitted sheet 54-inch by 75-inch and 10-inch drop
Machine wash in cold water before use, tumble dry low, remove promptly, no iron

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars655 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
